titleStmt.title: Description of Columbia University MS Or 23: ʻAjīb al-masāʼil. Risālah dar hayʼat.

notesStmt.note: Title of first work from introduction (f. 3r). Title of second work supplied by cataloger.

msContents.summary: Composite manuscript with two works. The first on ritual practice with chapters on cleanliness, prayers, fasting, alms giving, pilgrimage, marriage, legal guardianship, and inheritance; the second text an astronomical treatise by ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Qūshjī.

respStmt.persName: Ghulām Muḥyī al-Dīn walad Muḥammad Akram
غلام محيى الدين ولد محمد اكرم ،

supportDesc.extent: ii, 48, 46, ii leaves : 219 x 137 (170 x 80) mm, bound to 224 x 141 mm

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in taʻlīq and nastaʻlīq; pointed.

decoDesc.decoNote: Rubrications in red; some diagrams in red.

binding.p: Bound in cardboard with plain paper sides, light brown spine and edges.

origin.p: The first item is undated, possibly produced in the 17th century, copied by Ghulām Muḥyī al-Dīn walad Muḥammad Akram (f. 48r). The second work is dated Jumādá al-Ūlá 1228 A.H.
